description.value:
This beautiful leather bag is lined in soft fur and purrs quietly when pet.

Activate 2 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You shake the bag to produce a single cat. You cast a 3rd-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Animal] to produce a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.Leopard].

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You pull the bag over your head and it covers you completely. You then exit the bag in the form of a large cat. You gain the effects of 3rd-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Animal Form] but must use the cat battle form.

publication.title: Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind
